sentences.en: ...a 13-year-old boy whose crime file includes violence, theft, vandalism and bullying.
sentences.cn: …一个犯罪档案中包括暴力、偷窃、破坏公物和恃强凌弱的13岁男孩。
恣意破坏公共财物的行为

sentences.en: But what has surprised everyone is the vandalism to the bikes.
sentences.cn: 但是,对自行车的人为破坏使每个人都感到惊讶.

sentences.en: He says they were taken aback by the vandalism.
sentences.cn: 他说,(对自行车的)破坏行为让他们很吃惊.

sentences.en: It was stupid, just vandalism for the hell of it.
sentences.cn: 只是为了好玩而破坏公物是很愚蠢的行为。
这是无端、愚蠢的恶意破坏。

sentences.en: It's time to call a halt to vandalism.
sentences.cn: 现在是要求人们停止破坏文物的时候了.

sentences.en: One of the things that concerns me is the rise in vandalism.
sentences.cn: 令我担忧的问题之一是蓄意破坏案件的上升.

sentences.en: Sections of the Wall are also prone to graffiti and vandalism.
sentences.cn: 长城局部也容易被破坏.

sentences.en: She declined, saying, " There is already too much publicity given to acts of vandalism and violence. "
sentences.cn: 她婉转地拒绝说, “ 关于野蛮行为和暴力事件,已经报道得太多了. ”

sentences.en: The only vandalism that happens in this town goes through me.
sentences.cn: 这镇里所有的故意破坏都得经过我.

sentences.en: The students who set fire to the library were charged with vandalism.
sentences.cn: 这些在图书馆放火的学生被控恶意破坏公物.

sentences.en: This act of vandalism somehow satisfied him.
sentences.cn: 可是他满足了,因为他毁坏了什么东西.

sentences.en: This is not normal vandalism but it comes with political intention.
sentences.cn: 咋看之下,这不是普通的破坏公物,图像带有政治意味.

sentences.en: We must stamp out vandalism in this town once and for all.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要在这个城市彻底杜绝破坏公共财产的行为.

words.tran_cn: 文化艺术的破坏者；蓄意破坏者

trans.tran_en: the crime of deliberately damaging things, especially public property
